briefTitle: A Phase 3 Molluscum Contagiosum Efficacy and Safety Study

outcomeMeasures.title: Complete Clearance of All Treatable MC at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent (proportion) of subjects with complete clearance of all treatable MC at Week 12. This was measured by dividing the number of subjects who showed complete clearance by the number in that treatment group (this represents our primary outcome variable).

outcomeMeasures.title: A Lesion Count of 0 or 1 of All Treatable MC at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent (proportion) of subjects achieving a lesion count of 0 or 1 of all treatable MC at Week 12.

outcomeMeasures.title: 90% Reduction From Baseline in the Number of All Treatable MC at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent (proportion) of subjects achieving at least a 90% reduction from Baseline in the number of all treatable MC at Week 12

outcomeMeasures.title: Complete Clearance of All Treatable MC at Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent (proportion) of subjects with complete clearance of all treatable MC at Week 8. This was measured by dividing the number of subjects who showed complete clearance at week 8 by the number in that treatment group (this represents our secondary outcome variable).

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in the Number of All Treatable MC at Week 4
outcomeMeasures.description: Percent change from Baseline in the number of all treatable MC at Week 4
